Item.name: Alien writing: force alienwriting1 event
Item.description: A SINGER IS BORN — AUDIENCE GATHERS, [UNTRANSLATABLE?] SPREADS — OUTGROWS THE CRADLE, FORTRESS IS BUILT — TO HOUSE — TO PROTECT

Item.name: Alien writing: force alienwriting2 event
Item.description: LIFE INCUBATED UNDER ICE — CONSCIOUSNESS FORMS, KNOWLEDGE COMPOUNDS — CIVILIZATION DEVELOPS, INSULATED FROM DANGER

Item.name: Alien writing: force alienwriting4 event
Item.description: THE SINGER IS ALONE - THE DEVOTED LONGING FOR [UNTRANSLATABLE?] - A BRIDGE TO BRING NIGH THE GREAT SPHERE IS BUILT

Item.name: Alien writing: force alienwriting5 event
Item.description: WHICH CAME FIRST - YOH-WEY, THE DEVOTED, THE ONES FROM THE SKY - THIS ONE DOES NOT KNOW, BUT IS SURELY ONE OF THE LAST, LEST THEY CAN QUENCH THE RADIANCE

Item.name: Alien writing: force alienwriting6 event
Item.description: THE RADIANCE OF THE GREAT SPHERE - DID WE NOT UNDERSTAND OR DID WE NOT [UNTRANSLATABLE?] - THE BRIDGE CALLS IT FORTH
